   # Built application files
   *.apk
   *.aar
   *.ap_
   *.aab

   # Files for the ART/Dalvik VM
   *.dex

   # Java class files
   *.class

   # Generated files
   bin/
   gen/
   out/

   # Gradle files
   .gradle/
   build/

   # Local configuration file
   local.properties

   # Android Studio
   *.iml
   .idea/
   .DS_Store

   # External native build folder
   .externalNativeBuild
   .cxx/

   # Misc
   .settings/
   .loadpath
   .recommenders
   .vscode/
